TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of some types of cancer. It belongs to the families of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors and protein kinase inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de algunos tipos de cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis e inhibidor de la proteína cinasa.
